translation.en: -[bright orchestral music playing] -[chimes jingling]
-[robot whirring] -[elf yelps, groans]
[in Elvish] Watch it!
[exhales, in English] We had some good times…
[inhales sharply] …until you ruined everything.
You were the first humans I ever trusted…
and the last.
[in Elvish] Belsnickel.
[in English] Speck.
[sniffling] Don't sneak up on someone like that.
[Speck, in Elvish] Oh, sorry.
-[in English] What took you so long? -[grunts]
[shakily, in Elvish] It was a very long journey.
[yelps] She's your ticket back into the North Pole.
[in English] She better be, for your sake.
There's only five days left until Christmas.
[Kate] Let me go!
What are you doing with my camera?
But, wow, I come from a long line of True Believers.
An honest-to-God True Believer.
Well… I'm about to change all of that.
-[menacing music plays] -Track her down.
[Speck, in Elvish] I'm on it.
-[exhales] -[in English] She's perfect.
Lamest Christmas ever.
-Really? -Yeah.
What kind of person would wanna spend the best holiday of the year
sitting on the hot beach with fruity umbrella drinks?
translation.ko: 뜨거운 해변에서 우산 꽂은 음료수나 마셔?

translation.en: I'm gonna go with just about everybody.
Well, not me.
Not when I could be at home baking cookies
and building snowmen with real snow.
And worst of all, all my friends are having parties
translation.ko: 무엇보다 지금 내 친구들은 파티를 열고

translation.en: and shopping, sledding.
[sighs] I'm missing everything.
[scoffs] Kate, there's nothing you can do about it, okay?
So you might as well just relax and try to have fun.
translation.ko: 여기서 그냥 마음 편히 놀아 봐

translation.en: Think I liked you better when you were a car thief.
translation.ko: 오빠는 자동차 도둑 시절이 더 괜찮았어

translation.en: I liked you better when you weren't such a buzzkill.
translation.ko: 넌 흥 안 깨던 시절이 더 좋았어

translation.en: -Ugh, how embarrassing. -[Claire and man laughing]
-Hey, come on! -Hey!
Oh, so that's what this is about. Bob.
No, this is not about Bob. I could care less about Bob.
translation.ko: 아니, 밥 아저씨랑 상관없어 난 관심도 없거든?

translation.en: He just brought us here so he could kiss up to Mom.
translation.ko: 그저 엄마한테 잘 보이려고 우릴 데려온걸

translation.en: Give him a break, Kate. It means he really likes her.
It's too soon. They've only been dating for ten months.
And they've known each other a lot longer than that.
Besides… he makes Mom happy.
Yeah, well, he's not Dad.
-[Kate sighs] -Cómo estás, party people? [chuckles]
What are we looking at?
Ugh! Now, there's something you can't unsee. Am I right?
translation.ko: 안 본 눈 사고 싶다, 안 그래?

translation.en: What are the odds my dad proposes on this trip?
translation.ko: 이번 여행 중에 우리 아빠가 청혼하실까?

translation.en: Or maybe she does.
I mean, your mom is a pretty progressive woman.
Teddy! I heard they have snorkeling. You wanna go?
Yeah, one sec.
-You two want to come? -Nope.
Yeah. Thanks for asking, Teddy, but I've got horrible anxiety,
translation.ko: 응, 물어봐 줘서 고맙긴 한데 난 지독한 불안증에다

translation.en: asthma, and about 11 different allergies.
All right. Um, well, suit yourselves.
Hey, cheer up, Grinch.
For a True Believer, you're forgetting the number one rule.
-"Better not pout." -[band continues singing]
-[Bob's son] Hey, Kate! Wait up! -Another chocolate smoothie, please.
translation.ko: 케이트 누나, 기다려 초콜릿 스무디 한 잔 더요

translation.en: Make that two. Can you prepare mine lactose-free?
translation.ko: 두 잔 주세요 저는 유당 없는 걸로 될까요?

translation.en: -Okay. -Thank you.
-So what should we do? -"We"?
Oh, I'm gonna hang out by myself, but why don't you try the waterslide?
translation.ko: 난 혼자 놀 건데 넌 워터 슬라이드나 타면 어때?

translation.en: -Looks pretty fun. -And risk breaking my nose?
-It's one of my best features. -[Claire sighs] Hey, guys.
They're having a caroling party on the beach. You wanna join?
translation.ko: 바닷가에서 캐럴 파티 하던데 같이 갈래?

translation.en: -Yeah. -No, thanks.
Come on, Kate. I heard you love singing Christmas carols.
translation.ko: 같이 가자, 케이트 캐럴 부르는 거 좋아한다며

translation.en: Kate has a great singing voice. She was lead vocalist in the school choir.
translation.ko: 노래를 참 잘해 교내 합창단 리드 보컬도 했어

translation.en: In fifth grade.
Really? So was I.
-Really? -Yeah.
You know, nothing raises the Christmas Spirit like music.
translation.ko: 크리스마스 정신 살리는 데는 음악만 한 게 없지

translation.en: -Come on. Music? -[chuckles] Yeah.
♪ O Christmas Tree, O Christmas Tree ♪
♪ How lovely are your branches ♪
-[Claire sighs] -Did I… Did I do something wrong?
No, it's just…
That was her dad's favorite song.
-I'm so sorry. I didn't know. -No, of course not. How could you?
translation.ko: 미안, 그것도 모르고 당연히 모르지, 어떻게 알겠어?

translation.en: She's just being a teenager.
Santa, I know it's probably too late to write a letter,
translation.ko: 산타 할아버지 편지 쓰기엔 너무 늦었을 테고

translation.en: and the Wi-Fi here stinks,
but if you're listening, I want to amend my Christmas wish.
translation.ko: 그래도 듣고 계신다면 저 크리스마스 소원 바꿀게요

translation.en: I mean, the electric scooter would be really cool,
but I need something more important than that right now.
I need to get out of this place.
Mom's basically ditching us for this new guy and his scaredy-cat son.
translation.ko: 엄마는 새 남친이랑 겁쟁이 아들 때문에 우릴 버렸어요

translation.en: -["O Christmas Tree" playing] -It's so depressing.
And in a few weeks, it's gonna be like Dad never even existed.
translation.ko: 몇 주 후면 아빠는 기억에서 영영 지워질 거 같아요

translation.en: So, please, Santa, help out a True Believer…
translation.ko: 그러니까 진짜 믿는 자를 제발 도와주세요

translation.en: or I swear…
I'm gonna run away.
So, you want to run away, eh?
I think we can make that happen.
[Bob] Guys, listen. I got some good news.
I woke up this morning with a little magic under the door.
translation.ko: 아침에 일어났더니 문틈에 기막힌 게 있더라

translation.en: We got some surprises, compliments of the hotel.
What?
First up, how would you like to mix it up with manta rays
translation.ko: 첫 번째는 '두 사람만을 위한 스노클링 어드벤처로'

translation.en: and tussle with turtles on a snorkel adventure for two?
Whoa, sounds dope. I know somebody who would love to go snorkeling.
translation.ko: 진짜 재밌겠네요 스노클링 좋아하는 친구가 있어요

translation.en: [Bob] But that's not all.
Two lucky people get an opportunity to have an overnight stay at Tulum
with a private tour of the Mayan ruins.
Are you serious?
[Bob] Pack your overnight bags and bring a sense of adventure.
An overnight in Tulum? That sounds amazing.
Listen, the kids are gonna have the time of their life
because, while your family is off the resort,
why not stuff your bellies with free ice cream
and choose from dozens of fun-filled activities
at the Kids Club at a slumber party?
Slumber party?
Kate, we're gonna have so much fun.
Wait, but I'm too old for Kids Club, right?
translation.ko: 저는 키즈 클럽 못 들어가는 나이잖아요?

translation.en: Actually, Kate, you just made the cut. You're good.
translation.ko: 케이트, 딱 네 나이까지야 갈 수 있어

translation.en: -Lucky you. [chuckles softly] -[Kate scoffs]
Wait. This isn't some trick just to get us out of the way
translation.ko: 잠깐만요 우릴 따돌리고 엄마한테 청혼하려는 술수죠?

translation.en: so you can propose to Mom, is it?
Kate! Sorry.
Okay, first, you make us spend Christmas on the freaking equator,
translation.ko: 크리스마스에 우리를 적도로 끌고 온 것도 모자라서

translation.en: and now you don't even wanna spend it together?
Okay. Excuse us.
-Come on. -[Kate huffs]
Why are you acting so rude to Bob?
He's treating us to this incredible trip. You should try not to forget that.
translation.ko: 이런 멋진 여행에 불러준 걸 자꾸 잊어버릴래?

translation.en: And you should try not to forget Dad.
[sighs] Look, just because I care for Bob,
translation.ko: 케이트, 내가 밥한테 마음이 있다고 해서…

translation.en: and… and I do. I… I care about him very much…
that doesn't mean I love your father any less.
translation.ko: 그렇다고 아빠를 사랑하지 않는 건 아니야

translation.en: Yeah, well, I just don't see how that's possible.
-All right. [scoffs] -[horn honks]
Look, I'm just gonna tell Bob we can't go to Tulum.
We'll just… We'll stay here with you guys.
-[passengers chattering] -Um, no. Um, actually, um, you should go.
But I can't. I'm not… I'm not gonna just leave you here like this.
translation.ko: 아니야, 네가 이러는데 어떻게 두고 가겠어

translation.en: It's okay, Mom.
I was being a brat. I don't know what came over me.
You and Bob deserve to have some fun.
And I know how much you've been dying to see those Mayan ruins.
translation.ko: 엄마는 마야 유적을 꼭 보고 싶어 했잖아요

translation.en: [chortles] Really? You honestly feel that way?
I do.
And I promise, you won't have to worry about me for the rest of the trip.
translation.ko: 약속해요, 여행 마칠 때까지 제 걱정은 안 하셔도 돼요

translation.en: Yeah, hi.
I was wondering if you had any more room on today's flight back to Boston.
translation.ko: 오늘 보스턴행 비행기에 남는 자리가 있을까요?

translation.en: Yeah, I was thinking about ending my trip early.
translation.ko: 네, 여행을 좀 빨리 마칠까 해서요

translation.en: I can change it at the airport?
-Great. Thanks. -[cell phone locks]
All right, we'll be back by late afternoon tomorrow.
translation.ko: 그럼 우린 내일 오후 늦게 올게

translation.en: I know I was talking a big game this morning, Dad,
but I'm starting to have second thoughts about this.
[sighs] You sure you need to be away for a whole day?
[clicks tongue] Uh… Look, man, all right?
I know it's been rough ever since your mom died.
But we have to keep moving. We have to keep moving ahead.
translation.ko: 하지만 이젠 털고 일어서야 해 앞을 보고 나가야지

translation.en: Plus, I think a little independence might be good for you.
translation.ko: 게다가 너도 독립심을 키워볼 때가 됐어

translation.en: I just wish we could be independent in closer proximity.
translation.ko: 그저 아빠 곁에서 독립심을 키우고 싶어서요

translation.en: [chuckles softly, clicks tongue] You got this. Bring it in.
You got this, all right?
-[Claire] Good? -Yeah, he's good.
[woman] Everybody going to Tulum, I need your tickets, please.
Oh, all right. You guys, take care.
-Teddy-- -I know, Mom. No alcohol.
Yes, and I was hoping you could check in on them, please?
translation.ko: 그래, 그것도 그렇고 애들 좀 챙겨 줄래?

translation.en: Yeah, I… I got it covered. Okay?
-Okay, uh, love you. -[Kate] Love you.
-[inhales sharply] All right. Have fun. -Okay, guys. See you soon.
translation.ko: 저도요 - 그럼 재밌게 지내 - 그래, 금방 다녀올게

translation.en: You know, you really don't have to check in on us.
-Yeah, I wasn't planning on it. -[girl] Teddy!
See you tomorrow.
Hey, um, Kate! Where are you going? Kids Club is this way.
translation.ko: 케이트 누나, 어디 가? 키즈 클럽은 이쪽이야

translation.en: Right. Um, yeah.
translation.ko: 그렇지! 그래, 난 화장실 다녀올 건데

translation.en: I'm gonna go to the bathroom,
but why don't you go ahead and head over there, and I'll meet you in a few?
translation.ko: 너 먼저 가 있으면 곧 따라갈게

translation.en: I'll wait for you.
Go to the Kids Club, Jack. That is a direct babysitter's order.
translation.ko: 키즈 클럽으로 가, 잭 보모 누님의 명령이야

translation.en: You're only three years older than me.
But I believe in a chain of command,
so I'll save you a spot at the slime-making station.
Hello. Are you waiting for the airport shuttle?
Yeah.
Driver just popped a tire, so I'm taking people over in the meantime.
translation.ko: 버스 타이어가 터져서 내가 손님을 모시고 있어

translation.en: Okay, cool.
I'm gonna take a little shortcut. Should get us there in half the time.
translation.ko: 지름길로 갈게 그럼 두 배는 빨라

translation.en: -Sounds great. -[golf cart engine revs]
So, I take it by the early checkout, your vacation isn't going so well.
translation.ko: 일찍 떠나는 거 보니까 휴가가 재미없었나 봐

translation.en: Ugh, it's complicated. My mom and--
Say no more.
My family was a real drag, too.
Ran away from that nightmare a couple years ago.
translation.ko: 몇 해 전에 그 지옥에서 탈출했지

translation.en: Right around your age.
I just thought it was best for everybody if I wasn't even here.
translation.ko: 내가 사라지면 모두에게 좋을 거 같았어

translation.en: They can have their new little family without me.
Kate!
Are you running away?
-You're supposed to be watching me. -[device beeping]
[Kate] Look, Jack, don't take this personally or anything…
What is that?
Looks like a wor--
Have a nice trip.
I don't think we're in Mexico anymore.
Yeah, I'm pretty sure there aren't any glaciers
in a 10,000-mile radius of the Yucatán Peninsula. [sighs]
[Jack] This looks like the North Pole!
He heard me.
[Jack] I knew I should've brought my puffy jacket.
We're gonna freeze to death out here.
Don't worry, Jack. It's gonna be okay.
He'll come for us… I hope.
[Jack] Who will come for us?
-Dasher! [shouts in Elvish] -[reins crack]
[in Elvish] I haven't seen you in a long time, Jola!
[in English] Thought you'd given up on reindeer.
[laughs] Let's see if you can handle this!
-[Kate, echoing] Help! -[music fades]
[Kate] Hello?
Somebody, please, help!
-[binoculars whirring] -[Santa] Wait a minute.
Eh, I guess this is your lucky day, Yule Cat!
translation.ko: 너 오늘 운 좋은 줄 알아라 성탄 살쾡이

translation.en: [in Elvish] Take to the air!
[in English] Oh, my.
[in Elvish] Back to the village!
[Santa, in English] All right! Stay with me now, ladies! Back in we go!
translation.ko: 정신 똑바로 차려, 얘들아 다시 들어간다!

translation.en: [in Elvish] Left!
[Santa] Right!
Left!
Right!
Left!
[Santa] Right!
Left!
Right!
[in English] We're through! Good work, ladies.
[sighs] It's good to be back inside the borealis, my old friend.
translation.ko: 보레알리스 장막 안쪽으로 돌아오니 좋다, 친구야

translation.en: [sighs] As you can see, Santa fell right into my trap.
translation.ko: 너희도 봤지? 산타가 내 미끼를 물었어

translation.en: [exhales] The old man's time is coming to an end.
-[Jola purrs] -And mine is just beginning.
-Stop that. -[gasps]
[in Elvish] Oh, sorry.
[in English] Oh, dear.
[in Elvish] He's coming in hot!
-[Santa shouts command in Elvish] -[in English] What in the world?
[in Elvish] Stow it away.
And feed the reindeer.
-[in English] What's happening? -[Santa] Outside the veil, the ice pack.
translation.ko: 어떻게 된 거야? 장막 바로 바깥쪽 얼음판에 꽁꽁 얼어 있었어

translation.en: [grunts] Nearly frozen.
translation.ko: 장막 바로 바깥쪽 얼음판에 꽁꽁 얼어 있었어

translation.en: Oh, dear.
-Jojo, start up some hot chocolate. -[Jojo] Uh-huh.
And, Hugg, put in some thistle berry, jitterbug juice,
translation.ko: 그리고 허그는 엉겅퀴 베리, 지터버그 즙이랑

translation.en: and Cornish pixie dandruff.
[in Elvish] It's ready.
-Drink. -[Kate sips]
There you go. [sighs]
You're gonna be all right, Kate.
How do you know who I am?
Oh, everyone knows who you are around here.
We've all watched the tape of your little Christmas adventures
from two years ago.
Are you Mrs. Claus?
That's me.
So, does that mean…?
Santa!
[chuckles] Kate Pierce!
-You feeling all right? -Yeah, I feel fine, but…
translation.ko: 케이트 피어스! 괜찮니? 네, 괜찮긴 한데…

translation.en: did we just crash through a kaleidoscope? There were so many different colors.
translation.ko: 무슨 만화경을 통과한 건가요? 색깔이 알록달록하던데요

translation.en: Oh, no. That was just us coming back through the Veil of Borealis.
translation.ko: 아니, 보레알리스 장막을 뚫고 돌아온 거란다

translation.en: You see, we live under its shield here.
Uh, it keeps us hidden and protected from the outside world.
translation.ko: 바깥세상에 안 보이게 우리를 보호해 주지

translation.en: [chuckles] But tell me, how in the name of all things sacred
did you end up in the middle of the North Pole?
-Wait, you didn't bring me here? -No, I didn't bring you here.
translation.ko: 할아버지가 데려오신 거 아니에요? 난 아니란다

translation.en: You're supposed to be in Cancun, if I'm not mistaken.
[Mrs. Claus] Drink.
There you go, sweetie. Do you feel better?
Yeah. I feel… really good.
That's some hot chocolate.
My special recipe.
You're just lucky I was out there hunting Jola the Yule Cat.
translation.ko: 마침 성탄 살쾡이 졸라를 사냥할 때라 다행이었지

translation.en: Otherwise, I never would have seen you.
But I thought this was, like, part of your plan.
You know, to grant my Christmas wish.
-[quietly] The electric scooter? -No, not the-- [scoffs]
I'm talking about the wish. You know…
[whispers] …the wish.
Yes. Wow, the other wish. Mm-hmm.
Yeah. Well, I figured it was a stretch, so I took matters into my own hands,
translation.ko: 네, 이뤄지긴 힘들 것 같아서 제가 직접 해결하기로 하고

translation.en: and I was on my way to the airport when our shuttle fell into this wormhole.
translation.ko: 제가 직접 해결하기로 하고 공항에 가던 중에 셔틀이 웬 웜홀에 빠졌어요

translation.en: Wormhole?
-Mina. -[Mina] Yeah?
[in Elvish] Go check out the village. Let me know if you see anything strange.
translation.ko: 마을을 수색해 봐 수상한 게 보이면 알려다오

translation.en: Right away, Santa.
[in English] This doesn't look like Kids Club.
-[grumbles] -What is that thing?
[laughs] It's okay. His name is Hugg, and he's an elf.
-An elf? -An elf.
-So, are those…? -[Mrs. Claus] Mm-hmm.
And are you…?
Then where's…?
Welcome to the North Pole, Jack.
-Are you really…? -I am.
Uh-uh. No way. I must be dreaming.
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼, 제가 꿈을 꾸나 봐요

translation.en: Oh, you're not dreaming, Jack. You're in Santa's Village.
translation.ko: 꿈이 아니야, 잭 여긴 산타 마을이야

translation.en: The real one.
Nick, I bet the children would like a tour.
Of the village? A tour? Of course! Would you?
Are you kidding? I mean, that would be amazing.
translation.ko: 그걸 말이라고 하세요? 그럼 너무 좋죠!

translation.en: Yeah.
Well, then, we'll have to get you into some warm clothes first.
Wow! Oh.
-This is so cool. -[chuckles] Yeah.
[Santa] The village houses over a million elves.
translation.ko: 이 마을엔 100만 명이 넘는 엘프가 살아

translation.en: Now, if you combine Amazon, FedEx, the postal service, and UPS
translation.ko: 자, 아마존, 페덱스 우체국 택배, UPS와

translation.en: with every manufacturing company in the world,
and they quadrupled their output for an entire year,
well, you just might be getting close to what we can accomplish
here in Santa's Village in a single day.
translation.ko: 산타 마을의 하루 생산량에 겨우 비할 수 있지

translation.en: So, where's your workshop?
[chuckles] Why, you're walking in it.
-Really? -[laughs] Yes.
Well, we have over 300,000 shops here in the village.
And each and every one designed by Mrs. Claus.
[gasps, in Elvish] Is that Kate Pierce?
[in English] If she designed this place, I think it should be called "Mrs. Claus's Village."
translation.ko: 할머니가 설계한 마을이라면 산타 할머니 마을이라고 해야죠

translation.en: -Me too. -Why, I… I never thought of that.
translation.ko: 맞아요! 이런, 그 생각은 못 했네

translation.en: -Of course he didn't. -[Santa] Uh…
Ah, I mean, I did discover it, and the elves built it, but, I don't know,
